name: APTITUDE
description:
The Yima Cartel Family is looking to develop some new luxury robots, and their R&D staff was getting bored anyway.

Simple puzzles of cognition give way to something... weirder. Maybe.

Set in Parhelion's universe, but no knowledge of the comic is necessary.

(Content warnings for drugging, bodily-possession, mild dispassionate medical probing, and similar themes/elements.)
